casebody.data:
No. 10-5237. Johnny Hunt, Petitioner v. R. David Mitchell, Correctional Administrator, Mountain View Correctional Institution. 562 U.S. 910, 131 S. Ct. 263,

178 L. Ed. 2d 174,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6811. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 367 Fed. Appx. 454.
